name: QuestCODEX©
description:
QuestCODEX© is a tool I created with the intention of turning everyday tasks into quests that an NPC could give you in a fantasy world of any RPG.

Through this tool and your creativity you will be able to create absolutely any type of quest to motivate you to get rid of bad habits, create new habits and even complete other tasks that don't seem so attractive.

I hope you enjoy!

Follow me on twitter!
